ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
PrecisRe-appointment of FAYE ACKERMANS of Gatineau, Quebec, as a part-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective July 2, 2018.
